CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing New Users relative to Premium Users?
SRP.A: New Users is {above} Premium Users in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total user engagement rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Premium Users}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total user engagement rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {New Users}.

VE.Q: What is Premium Users's User Engagement Rate in 1986?
VE.A: Premium Users's user engagement rate in 1986 is {4.93} %.

VE.Q: What is Premium Users's User Engagement Rate in 1983?
VE.A: Premium Users's user engagement rate in 1983 is {7.31} %.

VE.Q: What is Premium Users's User Engagement Rate in 1979?
VE.A: Premium Users's user engagement rate in 1979 is {10.34} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum User Engagement Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum user engagement rate is {2.80} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum User Engagement Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum user engagement rate is {23.15} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest User Engagement Rate level recorded for New Users?
What is the lowest User Engagement Rate level recorded for New Users?
EVJ.A: New Users's lowest recorded level is approximately {4.37} % in {1986}.

SC.Q: What is the average total User Engagement Rate?
SC.A: The average total user engagement rate is {21.73} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total User Engagement Rate go below 14.30 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total User Engagement Rate exceed 26.46 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total User Engagement Rate in 1978 higher or lower than in 1983?
NC.A: The total user engagement rate in 1978 was {higher} than in 1983.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1986, was the average total User Engagement Rate higher or lower than between 1974 and 1984?
NC.A: The average total user engagement rate between 1976 and 1986 was {lower} than between 1974 and 1984.

NC.Q: Between 1973 and 1976, was the average total User Engagement Rate higher or lower than between 1983 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total user engagement rate between 1973 and 1976 was {higher} than between 1983 and 1987.

NC.Q: Was the total User Engagement Rate in 1973 higher or lower than in 1977?
NC.A: The total user engagement rate in 1973 was {higher} than in 1977.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Premium Users} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Premium Users, New Users}.
